import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name : '', email : '', password: '', password2: '' }); const {name, email, password} = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); const onSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault(); if(password!==password2){ console.log('Invalid password, please try again'); }else{ console.log(formData) } } return (
onSubmit(e)}> Sign Up
onChange(e)} placeholder = "Name" required />
onChange(e)} required />

) } export default Register;
